channel.title: Comments on: Build your resume for the position
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Hui
item.dc:creator: Hui
item.description: i totally agree. However, more and more employers are looking for people with expert level on all T-SQL features plus front end skillsets, what can you do about that? Cause very very few people can have that expert knowledge on such a broad level
item.content:encoded: i totally agree. However, more and more employers are looking for people with expert level on all T-SQL features plus front end skillsets, what can you do about that? Cause very very few people can have that expert knowledge on such a broad level
